00038 struct MyPolicy : Config::Policy {
00039   static void init_options() {
00040     cmdline_desc().add_options()
00041       ("dryrun,n", "Dryrun, don't modify (delete files etc.)")
00042       ("full", "Do a full scan of DFS files and compare with METADATA.")
00043       ;
00044   }
00045 };
00046 
00047 typedef Cons<MyPolicy, DefaultCommPolicy> AppPolicy;
00048 
00049 void
00050 do_tfgc(bool dryrun, bool full) {
00051   ConnectionManagerPtr conn_mgr = new ConnectionManager();
00052   DfsBroker::Client *fs = new DfsBroker::Client(conn_mgr, properties);
00053   ClientPtr client = new Hypertable::Client("htgc");
00054   TablePtr table = client->open_table("METADATA");
00055   master_gc_once(table, fs, dryrun);
00056 }
00057 
00058 } // local namespace
00059 
00060 int
00061 main(int ac, char *av[]) {
00062   try {
00063     init_with_policy<AppPolicy>(ac, av);
00064     do_tfgc(has("dryrun"), has("full"));
00065   }
00066   catch (Exception &e) {
00067     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00068     return 1;
00069   }
00070   return 0;
00071 }
